metadata.title: CVE-2024-42101 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/nouveau: fix null pointer dereference in nouveau_connector_get_modesIn nouveau_connector_get_modes(), the return value of drm_mode_duplicate()is assigned to mode, which will lead to a possible NULL pointerdereference on failure of drm_mode_duplicate(). Add a check to avoid npd.
